channel.title: Object Oriented Programming (OOP) on JavaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Object Oriented Programming (OOP) on JavaScript

item.title: Objectives
item.description: Learn how OOP concepts can be applied using JavaScript Understand the benefit of OOP Understand the benefits of using Classes Create Classes with a public and private interface Create Classes that inherit properties and methods from another Class

item.title: Code Along: Bank ATM
item.description: Code Along: Bank ATM We’re going to use Classes to complete an application that simulates basic functionality of an ATM Get the starter code The starter code for this lab is hosted on Github, see the url below: Code Along: Bank ATM Use the Assignment Submission Git Workflow (detailed here) to access and submit the assignment
